EmailTemplate.name: LNW - RCA sponsorship ideas
EmailTemplate.subject: Give us your feedback and win a £20 Nando's voucher!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}, remember back to NCS Real Challenge Action?
We need your feedback to help us make this year's sponsorship day better than ever! This was the day that you:
Got people to sponsor you for doing different challenges Worked with your team to complete a booklet of tasks Were awarded points for completing the tasks Raised money for your charity partner
Fill in this form to help us make the day even better for this year's NCS participants.The most useful entry will win a cheeky £20 Nando's voucher!
Good luck,
Megan The Challenge Society www.tcsnorthlondon.co.uk
